CustomField.formula: "status has been changed to the " & Text( Competency_Level__c ) & " level effective " & TEXT(DAY(TODAY())) & " " & Case(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", "None") &" " &TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))
CustomField.label: Competency Status Change Line Demotion
